night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors module¶

Module for miscellaneous preprocessing of the data.

class night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors.GeoTIFFPreprocessor(crs: CRS, spatial_error: float = 0.0, padding_fraction: float = 0.1, passthrough: bool = True)¶

Bases: TransformerMixin, BaseEstimator

Class for getting geotransforms out from a list of GeoTIFF filepaths.

fit(X: DataFrame | Series, *args, **kwargs)¶
transform(X: DataFrame | Series, *args, **kwargs)¶
class night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors.MetadataPreprocessor(io_manager: IOManager, crs: CRS, output_columns: list[str] = None, use_cached_output: bool = True, unhandled_files: str = 'drop', tz_offset_in_hr: float = 5.0, passthrough: list[str] = [])¶

Bases: TransformerMixin, BaseEstimator

Class for transforming filepaths into a metadata dataframe.

fit(X: ndarray[str] | list[str] | DataFrame, y=None) → MetadataPreprocessor¶

Fits the MetadataPreprocessor to the input data.

Parameters¶

XUnion[np.ndarray[str], list[str], pd.DataFrame]

The input filepaths to fit the preprocessor on.

yNone, optional

The target variable (default is None).

Returns¶

MetadataPreprocessor

The fitted MetadataPreprocessor object.

get_logs() → DataFrame¶

Combine the different logs

Returns¶

log_dfpd.DataFrame

Combined dataframe containing IMG, IMU, and GPS metadata for each image.

transform(X: DataFrame | Series, *args, **kwargs)¶
class night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors.MetadataPreprocessor135(io_manager: IOManager, crs: CRS, output_columns: list[str] = None, use_cached_output: bool = True, unhandled_files: str = 'drop', tz_offset_in_hr: float = 5.0, passthrough: list[str] = [])¶

Bases: MetadataPreprocessor

Subclass of Metadata for working with Metadata formatted similar to how it was formatted for FH135.

load_gps_log(gps_log_fp: str = None, latlon_crs: str = 'EPSG:4326') → DataFrame¶

Load the GPS log.

Parameters¶

gps_log_fp:

Location of the GPS log. Defaults to the one provided at init.

latlon_crs: str

The CRS of the latitude and longitude coordinates.

Returns¶

gps_log_df: pd.DataFrame

Dataframe containing the GPS log.

load_img_log(img_log_fp: str = None) → DataFrame¶

Load the images log.

Parameters¶

img_log_fp: Location of the image log.

Defaults to the one provided at init.

Returns¶

img_log_df: pd.DataFrame

Dataframe containing the image log.

load_imu_log(imu_log_fp: str = None) → DataFrame¶

Load the IMU log.

Parameters¶

imu_log_fp: Location of the IMU log.

Defaults to the one provided at init.

Returns¶

imu_log_df: pd.DataFrame

Dataframe containing the IMU log.
